info.description: Returns info about the NFL Schedule
info.title: NFL Football Schedule

get.description:
Return a list of NFL games based on a variety of parameters set in the query. 
![This endpoint is in production](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusprod.png)

count.description: Number of games that meet parameter

apiKey.name: api_key
apiKey.description: API key set in query to verify permissions.

yearParam.name: year
yearParam.description: The year of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

monthParam.name: month
monthParam.description: The month of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

dayParam.name: day
dayParam.description: The day of the month of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

timeParam.name: time
timeParam.description: The unix time of kickoff for games of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

seasonTypeParam.name: season_type
seasonTypeParam.description: Enum values for pre-season, regular season, and post season.

year.description: The year of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

month.description: The month of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

day.description: The day of the month of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

time.description: The unix time of kickoff for games of the season that you would like to find the schedule for.

season_type.description: Enum values (`PRE`, `REG`, `POST`) for pre-season, regular season, and post season.
